text: The 2015 Segunda División season, was the 70th edition of the second tier of Federación Peruana de Futbol. The tournament was played on a home-and-away round-robin basis. The clubs Alfonso Ugarte, Defensor San Alejandro and Pacífico withdrew before the start of the season and were relegated to the Copa Perú. The club San Simón was disabled and relegated to the Copa Perú for outstanding debts with the SAFAP. ==Teams== ===Stadia and Locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! City ! StadiumMost stadiums are owned by the Instituto Peruano del Deporte (IPD). !
